items.name: Bone
items.description: Creates a Bone

items.name: Parent Bones
items.description: Adds the child bones to the parent and outputs the modified parent bone

items.name: Bone Matrix from Head/Tail
items.description: Retrieves the bone head and tail from a bone transformation matrix

items.name: Bone Matrix to Head/Tail
items.description: Converts a Bone Matrix into the corresponding head and tail positions

items.name: Assign Weights to Vertex Group
items.description: Assigns vertex group weights to points in mesh

items.name: Vertex Group
items.description: Creates a vertex group

items.name: Object
items.description: Creates an Object

items.name: Parent Objects
items.description: Adds the child objects to the parent and outputs the modified parent object

items.name: Constraint
items.description: Creates a Constraint

items.name: Modifier
items.description: Creates a Modifier

items.name: Target
items.description: Creates a Target, a type used to set targets for entities in constraints and modifiers

items.name: External Target
items.description: Creates a Target from an object or bone external to this node network

items.name: Space
items.description: A transform space used in constraints and modifiers

items.name: Selection
items.description: A selection of a set of geometry data

items.name: Object Reference
items.description: A reference to an object not managed by Materialize

items.name: Image Reference
items.description: A reference to an image

items.name: Collection Reference
items.description: A reference to a collection

items.name: Material Reference
items.description: A reference to a material not managed by Materialize

items.name: Falloff
items.description: Falloff is used to control attenuation of constraints and modifiers

items.name: Geometry Node
items.description: The Geometry Node node is used to to create a geometry node modifier for objects

items.name: Mapping Curve
items.description: A mapping curve is used to specify a custom falloff attenuation

items.name: New Material
items.description: Creates a material from a material tree

items.name: Profile Curve
items.description: Creates a profile curve for use in modifiers
